headline: Alternative to Soft Delete. Again
description:
Hi all,

so it is clear that soft delete hard to implement correctly and in general it is evil. Usually the main reason for it is to preserve referenced data.

For example we have invoice and customer. We want to see this relation even if customer was deleted.

One of the approach is the customer snapshot stored in the invoice object. I want to discuss this approach.

So imagine we have have such invoice with customer snapshot, and invoice is editable (not paid). What if I want to update customer's name? I will update name in snapshot? In original record? Both?

It is interesting to hear your thoughts.
headline_zh-Hans: 软删除的替代方案。再次
headline_zh-Hant: 軟刪除的替代方案。再次
description_zh-Hans:
大家好，

因此，很明显，软删除难以正确实施，并且 一般来说，它是邪恶的。 通常情况下，它的主要原因是为了保留引用的数据。

例如，我们有发票和客户。我们希望看到这个

其中一个方法是将客户快照存储在发票对象中。 发票对象中存储的客户快照。我想讨论一下这个方法。

因此，设想我们有这样一张带有客户快照的发票，并且 发票是可编辑的（未支付）。如果我想更新客户的 名字呢？我将在快照中更新名字？还是在原始记录中？两者都是？

听到你的想法很有意思。
